original_text:
And he took up his discourse and said,
“The oracle of Balaam the son of Beor,
    the oracle of the man whose eye is opened,
korean_text: 예언하여 이르기를 브올의 아들 발람이 말하며 눈을 감았던 자가 말하며

sentences.original_text: And he took up his discourse
“The oracle of Balaam the son of Beor,
the oracle of the man whose eye is opened,
